[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”3.22″][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”About Your Department” subhead=”Subheading Text – There is no life in thee, now, except that rocking life.” admin_label=”About Your Department – Header” _builder_version=”4.0.11″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(0,0,0,0.5)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(0,0,0,0.55)” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”https://voices.uchicago.edu/ignite/files/2016/12/uchicago8-1ua1ok7.jpg”][/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”section” _builder_version=”3.22″ custom_padding=”42px|0px|63px|0px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”50px|0|50px|0″ custom_padding_phone=”” transparent_background=”off”][et_pb_row padding_mobile=”off” column_padding_mobile=”on” admin_label=”row” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Introduction Text” _builder_version=”4.0.11″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” use_border_color=”off”]

Welcome to your Basic Page

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”You can edit this content….” _builder_version=”4.6.0″]

You can edit this page content using the Visual Builder or the Divi Builder. To access the Divi Builder for this page, select the Edit Page option at the top of this page. You can also go to the Pages tab on your dashboard and select Basic Page. To access the Visual Builder, simply click on the Enable Visual Builder option on the top of the page. Remember to save any edits that you make by selecting Update (in Divi Builder) or by selecting the purple icon at the bottom of the page and then selecting Save (in Visual Builder).

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ background_color=”#000000″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#800000″ background_color_gradient_end=”#660000″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Basic Modules and Sample Sections – Header” _builder_version=”4.0.11″ background_layout=”dark”]

Basic Modules and Sample Sections

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Below are examples of different modules…” _builder_version=”4.0.11″ background_layout=”dark”]

Below are examples of different modules and section layouts available in the Divi Builder.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”section” _builder_version=”4.0.11″ custom_padding=”0px|0px|54px|0px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”50px|0|50px|0″ custom_padding_phone=”” border_width_bottom=”1px” border_color_bottom=”#cccccc” transparent_background=”off”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ padding_mobile=”off” column_padding_mobile=”on” admin_label=”row” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”70px|0px|24.375px|0px”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” use_border_color=”off” border_style=”solid”]

Toggle Module

This module can be used to create toggles for consolidating and expanding information. You can set the toggles to be initially opened or closed.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_toggle title=”Toggle Title One” _builder_version=”3.0.87″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_width=”1px” border_style=”solid”]

Text and media content can be included here.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Toggle Title Two” _builder_version=”3.0.87″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_width=”1px” border_style=”solid”]

Text and media content can be included here.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Toggle Title Three” _builder_version=”3.0.87″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_width=”1px” border_style=”solid”]

Text and media content can be included here.

[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Tab Module Blurb” _builder_version=”4.0.11″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” use_border_color=”off” border_style=”solid”]

Tab Module

This module allows you to create mutiple tabs (with text and media content) that you can easily click between.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_tabs _builder_version=”3.0.87″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_width=”1px” border_style=”solid”][et_pb_tab title=”Tab One” _builder_version=”3.0.48″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”]

Text and media content can be included here.
[/et_pb_tab][et_pb_tab title=”Tab Two” _builder_version=”3.0.48″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”]

Text and media content can be included here.
[/et_pb_tab][et_pb_tab title=”Tab Three” _builder_version=”3.0.48″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”]

Text and media content can be included here.
[/et_pb_tab][/et_pb_tabs][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row padding_mobile=”off” column_padding_mobile=”on” admin_label=”row” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”20px|0px|0px|0px”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Embedding a Video” _builder_version=”4.0.11″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” use_border_color=”off” border_style=”solid”]

Embedding a Video

To embed a video onto your page, simply create a new column and select the Video Module. Paste the embed code for the video into the module and it will appear on the page. To comply with UChicago’s digital accessibility guidelines, please provide a transcript for audio-only content and captions and a transcript for audiovisual content.[/et_pb_text][et_pb_video src=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3HWv6c7JW0M” _builder_version=”3.0.47″][/et_pb_video][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”section” _builder_version=”4.0.11″ custom_padding=”0px|0px|21px|0px” custom_padding_tablet=”50px|0|50px|0″ custom_padding_phone=”” border_width_bottom=”1px” border_color_bottom=”#ccc” transparent_background=”off” padding_mobile=”off”][et_pb_row padding_mobile=”off” column_padding_mobile=”on” admin_label=”row” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”54px|0px|34px|0px”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Three Column Layout with Blurb, Call to Action, and Testimonial Modules” _builder_version=”4.0.11″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” use_border_color=”off” border_style=”solid”]

Three Column Layout with Blurb, Call to Action, and Testimonial Modules

This is an examples of a three column layout with separate modules in each column. These are only a few examples of the modules available through the Divi Builder. Learn more about customizing your layout with Divi Sections and Rows.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ padding_mobile=”off” column_padding_mobile=”on” admin_label=”row” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Blurb Title” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”v” icon_color=”#155f83″ _builder_version=”4.0.11″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”center” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_width=”1px” border_style=”solid”]

Blurb text or media. You can change the icon at the top of the Blurb or remove it altogether.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_cta title=”Call to Action” button_url=”http://url” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”Button Text” _builder_version=”4.0.11″ background_color=”#155f83″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_width=”1px” border_style=”solid” button_letter_spacing_hover=”0″ button_text_size__hover_enabled=”off” button_one_text_size__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_text_size__hover_enabled=”off” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_one_text_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_text_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_border_width__hover_enabled=”off” button_one_border_width__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_border_width__hover_enabled=”off” button_border_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_one_border_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_border_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_border_radius__hover_enabled=”off” button_one_border_radius__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_border_radius__hover_enabled=”off” button_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”on” button_letter_spacing__hover=”0″ button_one_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”off” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_one_bg_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_bg_color__hover_enabled=”off”]

Call to Action text and Button. You can use this feature to link to external or internal pages.

[/et_pb_cta][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_testimonial author=”Author Name” job_title=”Job Title” company_name=”Company Name” url_new_window=”on” portrait_url=”https://voices.uchicago.edu/ignite/files/2016/10/meb-headshot-1t43a35-1jp3kj2.jpg” quote_icon_color=”#155f83″ _builder_version=”4.0.11″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” use_border_color=”off”]

Customer or client testimonials or reviews for services.

[/et_pb_testimonial][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.0.11″ custom_padding=”||0px||false|false”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.0.11″ custom_padding=”||0px||false|false”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.0.11″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Specialty Sections – Heading” _builder_version=”4.0.11″ header_2_text_align=”center”]

Specialty Sections

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ specialty=”on” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”section” _builder_version=”3.22″ custom_padding=”16px|0px|21px|0px” custom_padding_tablet=”50px|0|50px|0″ custom_padding_phone=”” transparent_background=”off” padding_mobile=”off”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” use_border_color=”off” border_style=”solid”]

Bar Counter Module

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_counters bar_bg_color=”#155f83″ _builder_version=”4.0.11″ title_font_size=”17px” custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding_tablet=”|||” custom_padding_phone=”|||” custom_padding_last_edited=”off|desktop” border_radii=”on|0px|0px|0px|0px” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_width=”1px” border_style=”solid” border_radius=”0″][et_pb_counter percent=”25″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ background_enable_color_default=”on” parallax_default=”off” parallax_method_default=”on” bar_background_color_default=”#155f83″ use_percentages=”on” border_radius=”0″ allow_player_pause_default=”off”]Bar Counter One
[/et_pb_counter][et_pb_counter percent=”50″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ background_enable_color_default=”on” parallax_default=”off” parallax_method_default=”on” bar_background_color_default=”#155f83″ use_percentages=”on” border_radius=”0″ allow_player_pause_default=”off”]Bar Counter Two

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column_inner][/et_pb_row_inner][et_pb_row_inner column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ padding_mobile=”off” column_padding_mobile=”off” _builder_version=”3.25″][et_pb_column_inner type=”1_2″ saved_specialty_column_type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_circle_counter title=”Circle Counter Module” number=”25″ percent_sign=”off” bar_bg_color=”#155f83″ circle_color_alpha=”0.15″ _builder_version=”4.0.11″ number_font_size=”43px”][/et_pb_circle_counter][/et_pb_column_inner][et_pb_column_inner type=”1_2″ saved_specialty_column_type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.0.11″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” use_border_color=”off” border_style=”solid”]

The modules shown here are Bar Counter, Circle Counter, Text, and Social Media modules.
